Package org.qdl_lang.gui.editor

Class QDLEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qdl_lang.gui.editor.QDLEditor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QDLSASEditor
    public class QDLEditor
extends Object
    A standalone editor for QDL. This can be invoked by the GUI.
